project_descr: Strengthening DRR in SVG through enhancing DRR PAE and programmatic evaluation

outputs.output_descr:
St. Vincent and the Grenadines is a Participation State of the Caribbean Disaster Emergency Management Agency (CDEMA) and as a result has adopted the Enhanced Comprehensive Disaster Management (CDM) Strategy 2014- 2024, based on a revision of the 2007-2012 Strategy.

Through this project UNDP will continue to build on the support to the Comprehensive Disaster Management (CDM) strategy to advance disaster risk reduction in the island.  This will be seen through investments in hazard mapping and vulnerability assessments; support to early warning systems; and continued capacity development of di
